# Load Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

# Load data

```{r}
aug_01 <- read_csv(here("data/03_dat_aug_01.csv"))
```

```{r}
# make a longer data frame with a row for each "count" variable
long_data <- aug_01 |> 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = starts_with("pre_count") | starts_with("post_count"), # select count columns
    names_to = "count_type",  # new column for column names
    values_to = "count_value" # new column for values
  )



```

```{r}

selected_genes <- long_data |> 
  pull(name[])


```

```{r}

# create scatter plot
ggplot(long_data, aes(x = count_type, y = count_value, color = count_type)) +
  geom_text(aes(label = name), vjust = -0.5, size = 3, check_overlap = TRUE) +
  labs(
    title = "Scatter Plot of Pre and Post Counts",
    x = "Count Type",
    y = "Count Value",
    color = "Legend"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)
  )
        
```
